channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Potholes/road cracks outside of 51 Woodlands Ave, 15th December
item.description:
These potholes and road cracks have been here for months getting worse. They have been reported earlier this year, with no action taken. The pothole in the road is a previous ‘fix’ opening up again with the worst area roughly 100mm wide x 600mm deep. The road cracks are kerbside and again previously reported and no action taken. Cars are driving over and into the potholes and cracks, with small stones being flicked out

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Woodlands Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking bay illegally blocked, 15th December
item.description:
At the entrance to Park Grove from the Watling street end the parking bay is once again illegally blocked by a local resident. Please do NOT pass this on this Apcoa to deal with, they have supplied me with a link to this form to report it and they assure me that this down to Bexley council to deal with. This has now been reported 3 times and never dealt with, I am hoping this time something will be done before the local residents being affected by this need to take it further.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Grove, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 6 Donaldson, 15th December
item.description:
Originally there was a street tree removed then the stump note pavement has been booked up and a load of barriers erected round it with no sign of what’s going on. Has been like this more than a week. What is going on please? Pavement needs reinstatement while length from Brondesbury to Victoria on west side is a total mess full of holes and trip hazards.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Donaldson Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
